modName: Darker nights and sharper image without the fps hit
summary: This is a tweaked ppi setup that provides darker nights and sharper image without the fps hit I was getting from similar mods.
descriptionHtml:
This is my tweaked ppi setup that provides darker nights, sharper image and slightly less saturated colours, without the performance hit I was getting from similar mods.
It\'s based on the look I was getting from Realistic Skyrim v3, which was my favourite, but also knocked about 8fps off my frames so this is why I tweked this one instead.

Make sure to set gamma to 1.0000 in skyrimPerfs.ini file or else it will be too dark.

Enjoy :)

Let me know how it goes for you.

TO INSTALL - Place contents of zip file in skyrim root directory.

TO REMOVE - Delete the folder and 3 files from skyrim root directory.
author: marcusarillius
